entries.title: TFWS v2.0.4 â€” restore index + policy pack + release layer
highlights: Restored /.well-known/tfws/v2/index.json and listed policy pack artifacts.
Published policy pack: agent decision contract, trust levels, trust-state template.
Added release pointers: releases/latest.json and releases/v2.0.4.json (+ minisig).
Added minisign pinned keys directory + explicit key list in ai-trust-hub.json.
Canonical redirects for TFWS v2 root and release alias.
